did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Holograph letter concerning the Mission La Purísima Concepción de Papigóchic.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Carta, 18 de Mayo de 1646 [i.e. 1648] (MS 190). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jesuit missionary credited with building La Purísima Concepción de Papigóchic. Killed in the revolt, 1650.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph letter concerning the Mission La Purísima Concepción de Papigóchic.

relatedmaterial.p: Photocopy from microfilm. Berkeley, Ca. : University of California, Bancroft Library.
